title: DnD Kit for Drag and Drop
statement: Use @dnd-kit/core for all drag and drop interactions on the task board.
constraints: Use DndContext with multiple DroppableContainers for cross-column moves
Keyboard accessibility must work via DnD Kit's native support
verification: Drag operations work via keyboard tab + space

metadata.rationale: DnD Kit is the most accessible React DnD library with the smallest bundle size.
